prizeListMission1: You win the glory of saving London from the Viper.
emailMission1:
The Viper has been spotted by Trafalgar Square. He is on to us, so you have only a few minutes. Go capture him before he escapes.

Good luck, Crime Fighter. All of London is depending on you...
revealcluesMission1: Here are the clue answers for Mission One

intro:
This is your first clue, Crime Fighter.

Good luck finding the Viper. The whole of London is depending on you!
